description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. The TEMPURA of the DEAD is a simple & exhilarating 8bit style 2D platformer & shooter. Switch between two unique characters -PRESIDENT TOMPSON and SAMURAI SUGIMOTO- and beat the zombies. Juggle the zombie's head to increase the extra life! You must find all GERMS of Calamity, and exterminate them to restore peace.
description.short: The TEMPURA of the DEAD is a simple & exhilarating 8bit style 2D platformer & shooter. Switch between two unique characters -PRESIDENT TOMPSON and SAMURAI SUGIMOTO- and beat the zombies. Juggle the zombie's head to increase the extra life! You must find all GERMS of Calamity, and exterminate them to restore peace.
